verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> that [one] told לְיוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> Joseph הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> Behold thy father חֹלֶ֑ה <WH2470> [is] sick וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and he took אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> with him his two בָנָיו֙ <WH1121> sons עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with אֶת־ <WH853> מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> Manasseh וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> and Ephraim

וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> And [one] told לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold בִּנְךָ֥ <WH1121> Behold thy son יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> Joseph בָּ֣א <WH935> cometh אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> about וַיִּתְחַזֵּק֙ <WH2388> strengthened יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> unto thee and Israel וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> himself and sat עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַמִּטָּֽה׃ <WH4296> upon the bed

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> unto Joseph אֵ֥ל <WH410> God שַׁדַּ֛י <WH7706> Almighty נִרְאָֽה־ <WH7200> appeared אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me בְּל֖וּז <WH3870> unto me at Luz בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ <WH1288> and blessed אֹתִֽי׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold מַפְרְךָ֙ <WH6509> unto me Behold I will make thee fruitful וְהִרְבִּיתִ֔ךָ <WH7235> and multiply וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> thee and I will make לִקְהַ֣ל <WH6951> of thee a multitude עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> of people וְנָ֨תַתִּ֜י <WH5414> and will give אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> this land הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> likewise לְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <WH2233> to thy seed אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <WH310> after thee אֲחֻזַּ֥ת <WH272> possession עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [for] an everlasting

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> And now thy two בָנֶיךָ֩ <WH1121> sons הַנּוֹלָדִ֨ים <WH3205> which were born לְךָ֜ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> unto thee in the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַד־ <WH5704> before בֹּאִ֥י <WH935> I came אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> to you מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <WH4714> unto thee into Egypt לִי־ הֵ֑ם <WH1992> are mine אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> and Manasseh כִּרְאוּבֵ֥ן <WH7205> [are] mine as Reuben וְשִׁמְע֖וֹן <WH8095> and Simeon יִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become לִֽי׃

וּמוֹלַדְתְּךָ֛ <WH4138> And thy issue אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that הוֹלַ֥דְתָּ <WH3205> which thou begettest אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH310> after לְךָ֣ יִהְי֑וּ <WH1961> become עַ֣ל <WH5921> after שֵׁ֧ם <WH8034> the name אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <WH251> of their brethren יִקָּרְא֖וּ <WH7121> them shall be thine [and] shall be called בְּנַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <WH5159> in their inheritance

וַאֲנִ֣י ׀ <WH589> I בְּבֹאִ֣י <WH935> And as for me when I came מִפַּדָּ֗ן <WH6307> from Padan מֵ֩תָה֩ <WH4191> died עָלַ֨י <WH5921> to my sorrow רָחֵ֜ל <WH7354> Rachel בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> by me in the land כְּנַ֙עַן֙ <WH3667> of Canaan בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way בְּע֥וֹד <WH5750> when כִּבְרַת־ <WH3530> yet [there was] but a little אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> way לָבֹ֣א <WH935> to come אֶפְרָ֑תָה <WH672> unto Ephrath וָאֶקְבְּרֶ֤הָ <WH6912> and I buried her שָּׁם֙ <WH8033> her there בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> there in the way אֶפְרָ֔ת <WH672> of Ephrath הִ֖וא <WH1931> he בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> the same [is] Bethlehem
וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> beheld יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> And Israel אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> Joseph's וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said מִי־ <WH4310> Who אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> another

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to his אָבִ֔יו <WH1> unto his father בָּנַ֣י <WH1121> They [are] my sons הֵ֔ם <WH1992> like אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> hath given לִ֥י אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> whom God בָּזֶ֑ה <WH2088> here וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> me in this [place] And he said קָֽחֶם־ <WH3947> Bring them נָ֥א <WH4994> please אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about וַאֲבָרֲכֵֽם׃ <WH1288> I pray thee unto me and I will bless

וְעֵינֵ֤י <WH5869> Now the eyes יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel כָּבְד֣וּ <WH3513> were dim מִזֹּ֔קֶן <WH2207> for age לֹ֥א <WH3808> he יוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> [so that] he could לִרְא֑וֹת <WH7200> not see וַיַּגֵּ֤שׁ <WH5066> And he brought them near אֹתָם֙ <WH853> אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him וַיִּשַּׁ֥ק <WH5401> unto him and he kissed לָהֶ֖ם וַיְחַבֵּ֥ק <WH2263> them and embraced לָהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> unto Joseph רְאֹ֥ה <WH7200> to see פָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thy face לֹ֣א <WH3808> never פִלָּ֑לְתִּי <WH6419> I had not thought וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold הֶרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> hath shewed אֹתִ֛י <WH853> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and lo God גַּ֥ם <WH1571> well אֶת־ <WH853> זַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <WH2233> me also thy seed

וַיּוֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> brought them out יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> from between בִּרְכָּ֑יו <WH1290> his knees וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <WH7812> and he bowed לְאַפָּ֖יו <WH639> himself with his face אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the earth

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took יוֹסֵף֮ <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵיהֶם֒ <WH8147> them both אֶת־ <WH853> אֶפְרַ֤יִם <WH669> Ephraim בִּֽימִינוֹ֙ <WH3225> in his right hand מִשְּׂמֹ֣אל <WH8040> left hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> toward Israel's וְאֶת־ <WH853> מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> and Manasseh בִשְׂמֹאל֖וֹ <WH8040> in his left hand מִימִ֣ין <WH3225> right hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> toward Israel's וַיַּגֵּ֖שׁ <WH5066> and brought [them] near אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> stretched out יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> And Israel אֶת־ <WH853> יְמִינ֜וֹ <WH3225> his right hand וַיָּ֨שֶׁת <WH7896> and laid עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> head אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> [it] upon Ephraim's וְה֣וּא <WH1931> who הַצָּעִ֔יר <WH6810> who [was] the younger וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׂמֹאל֖וֹ <WH8040> and his left hand עַל־ <WH5921> and רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> head מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> upon Manasseh's שִׂכֵּל֙ <WH7919> wittingly אֶת־ <WH853> יָדָ֔יו <WH3027> his hands כִּ֥י <WH3588> although מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> for Manasseh הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <WH1060> [was] the firstborn

וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <WH1288> And he blessed אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> Joseph וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said הָֽאֱלֹהִ֡ים <WH430> God אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom הִתְהַלְּכ֨וּ <WH1980> did walk אֲבֹתַ֤י <WH1> whom my fathers לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before אַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> Abraham וְיִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> and Isaac הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> the God הָרֹעֶ֣ה <WH7462> which fed אֹתִ֔י <WH853> מֵעוֹדִ֖י <WH5750> me all my life long עַד־ <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

הַמַּלְאָךְ֩ <WH4397> The Angel הַגֹּאֵ֨ל <WH1350> which redeemed אֹתִ֜י <WH853> מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all רָ֗ע <WH7451> me from all evil יְבָרֵךְ֮ <WH1288> bless אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּעָרִים֒ <WH5288> the lads וְיִקָּרֵ֤א <WH7121> be named בָהֶם֙ שְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> and let my name וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> on them and the name אֲבֹתַ֖י <WH1> of my fathers אַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> Abraham וְיִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> and Isaac וְיִדְגּ֥וּ <WH1711> and let them grow לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> into a multitude בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw יוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> And when Joseph כִּי־ <WH3588> for יָשִׁ֨ית <WH7896> laid אָבִ֧יו <WH1> that his father יַד־ <WH3027> hand יְמִינ֛וֹ <WH3225> his right עַל־ <WH5921> and רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וַיֵּ֣רַע <WH7489> displeased בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> affliction וַיִּתְמֹ֣ךְ <WH8551> him and he held up יַד־ <WH3027> hand אָבִ֗יו <WH1> his father's לְהָסִ֥יר <WH5493> to remove אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and רֹאשׁ־ <WH7218> head אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> it from Ephraim's עַל־ <WH5921> and רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> head מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> unto Manasseh's

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to his אָבִ֖יו <WH1> unto his father לֹא־ <WH3808> Not כֵ֣ן <WH3651> so אָבִ֑י <WH1> Not so my father כִּי־ <WH3588> for זֶ֣ה <WH2088> this הַבְּכֹ֔ר <WH1060> for this [is] the firstborn שִׂ֥ים <WH7760> put יְמִינְךָ֖ <WH3225> thy right hand עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> upon his head

וַיְמָאֵ֣ן <WH3985> refused אָבִ֗יו <WH1> And his father וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said יָדַ֤עְתִּֽי <WH3045> I know בְנִי֙ <WH1121> [it] my son יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> I know גַּם־ <WH1571> also ה֥וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> will become לְּעָ֖ם <WH5971> [it] he also shall become a people וְגַם־ <WH1571> also ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יִגְדָּ֑ל <WH1431> and he also shall be great וְאוּלָ֗ם <WH199> but truly אָחִ֤יו <WH251> brother הַקָּטֹן֙ <WH6996> his younger יִגְדַּ֣ל <WH1431> shall be greater מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> than וְזַרְע֖וֹ <WH2233> than he and his seed יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall become מְלֹֽא־ <WH4393> shall become a multitude הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of nations

וַיְבָ֨רֲכֵ֜ם <WH1288> And he blessed בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> them that day הַהוּא֮ <WH1931> he לֵאמוֹר֒ <WH559> saying בְּךָ֗ יְבָרֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> bless יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> In thee shall Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying יְשִֽׂמְךָ֣ <WH7760> make אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God כְּאֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> thee as Ephraim וְכִמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> and as Manasseh וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and he set אֶת־ <WH853> אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> Ephraim לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> Manasseh

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> unto Joseph הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I מֵ֑ת <WH4191> Behold I die וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> but God עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> you וְהֵשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> shall be with you and bring you again אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> of your fathers

וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> I נָתַ֧תִּֽי <WH5414> Moreover I have given לְךָ֛ שְׁכֶ֥ם <WH7926> portion אַחַ֖ד <WH259> to thee one עַל־ <WH5921> more אַחֶ֑יךָ <WH251> above thy brethren אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ <WH3947> which I took מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> out of the hand הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorite בְּחַרְבִּ֖י <WH2719> with my sword וּבְקַשְׁתִּֽי׃ <WH7198> and with my bow פ
